desc: As we age our hair can become dull, lifeless and may begin to fall out. Har Vokse works on all types of hair at different growth stages. The supplement can help grow hair that has been previously lost from existing hair follicles, as well as hair with stunted growth, allowing you to combat hair loss.

layout.text: Harvokse’s unique formula assists in hair growth & prevents hair loss. The powerful ingredients present in Harvokse work on multiple levels to get you the thick, strong & beautiful hair you deserve.
